subject: Re: Order #SSN2853 confirmed
description_text:
Der Simsonn Team

Order #SSN2853

If possible can you send two clutch pedal mounts for the haptic reactors if
they fit on the throttle and brake pedal to achieve a horizontal mount?

Thanks and Best Regards
Yannick

conversations.body_text: Hi Yannick Zarlenga,    We apologize for the delay. We are currently on an 8-day holiday break. We have made a note of this matter and will ship your order on the 9th. Thank you for your understanding and patience.
